def_en: If you shuffle somewhere, you walk there without lifting your feet properly off the ground.

def_cn: (通常因不舒服或难为情)挪动双脚，坐立不安
def_en: If you shuffle around, you move your feet about while standing or you move your bottom about while sitting, often because you feel uncomfortable or embarrassed.
If you shuffle playing cards, you mix them up before you begin a game.

def_cn: 将(纸张等)变换位置;打乱…的次序
def_en: If you shuffle things such as pieces of paper, you move them around so that they are in a different order.
